Course_Name: [SoSe 2024] GPE: Projects I Sustainable Business Models for Smartphones

Messages.Author: Maxim Mintchev Krassimirov
Messages.Content: Dear students, as announced today, we will meet again in a week, on 12.06, again at 10:30 in Room 307. Please prepare a presentation in which you detail the requirements for your business model, basing it off of the criteria and benchmark you developed for this week.  Since you have presented most of the background already, it should be a shorter presentation (around 15-20 minutes). Furthermore, please remember to upload your group's presentation from today in the ISIS course (it's enough for one of the group's members to upload it). Thank you and see you next week! Best, Maxim Mintchev and Valentin Eingartner

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Presentation of your literature review results

Messages.Author: Maxim Mintchev Krassimirov
Messages.Content: Dear students, we will be meeting next Wednesday at 05.06 at 10:30 at PTZ 307 to review your work on the project so far! Please prepare a presentation (maximum 30 minutes) in which you present your review of the literature and state of the art on sustainable business models for smartphones. Based on these sources, you should showcase good industry examples, set specific criteria for what a makes a smartphone business model sustainable, and create a benchmark for the sector. If you have any questions, Valentin Eingartner and I will be happy to answer to them. See you next week! Maxim Mintchev
